item.description:
FRI April 16 - SinglesCT.com Galactic Bowling Party- only $10 ADV TIX

Join SinglesCT.com at Bradley Bowl for a FUN evening of Bowling and New Friends

UNLIMITED Galactic Bowling from 8 pm to Midnight

Includes Shoes, Soda, Snacks, and PRIZES

- $50 worth of Bowling, Shoe Rentals, Food and Soda (plus prizes) for only $15
- save $5 and get your ticket in advance for only $10

Watch us transform the bowling center into party central with glowing black lights, special effect lighting, and state of the art sound system. …it’s a whole new game!

Bradley Bowl
129 Ella Grasso Turnpike
Windsor Locks, CT 06096

ACROSS FROM BRADLEY INTL AIRPORT

JOIN THE PARTY! MEET LOCAL SINGLES AND PARTY WITH SINGLESCT.COM

RECESSION BUSTER – Only $10 Advance Online tickets or $15 at the event

Visit http://www.SinglesCT.... Call (860) 236-3343

Be the first to know about our NEW EVENTS – Visit http://www.SinglesCT.... and sign up for our Email Newsletter
item.how_to_find_us: We will by the front desk, look for the SInglesCT.com Party Tonight signs
